planet.name: Kepler-55 b
KOI 904.02
KID 8150320
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 27.95 days for 3.4932 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
